title: ContractrPro
label: Cloud based Full-Stack SaaS App
description: A centralized platform to manage contracts and expenses, assign resources and track progress in real-time, making it easy to forecast revenue and expenses, track progress on individual contract-jobs, and manage resources.

title: Unreal GPT
label: AI Machine Learning
description: 1700+ pages of Unreal Engine documentation augmented and served through FAISS + OpenAI with LangChain.

title: Status Monitor
label: DevOps
description: Real-time global status monitoring page providing instant updates on the health and status of ALL self-hosted systems and services, offering crucial insights into current conditions and planned outages.

title: 32-bit Chipset Hardware Design
label: HDL (Hardware Description Language)
description: Design of various logic gates constructed from NAND gates. Circuit design drawn using falstad circuit simulator. Implemented using HDL and tested using hardware simulator, both provided by nand2tetris.

title: Rest-Inn API
label: Interactive
description: RESTful API for the Rest-Inn client, follows the OpenAPI 3.0.0 specification for documentation, and modern API design patterns such as stateless auth, validation, pagination, uploads and much more.

title: Rest-Inn
label: School Work
description: A highly responsive React client that replicates the functionality of AirBnB as a project for the WEB422 course in Seneca College.

title: Retro Flappy
label: Game Dev
description: Created with bracket_lib in Rust, Retro Flappy is a ascii-based clone of Flappy Birds.

title: UI / Graphic Designs
label: Design
description: A compilation of my UI related graphics I designed for my projects on Behance.net

title: Web Pong
label: Game Dev
description: Written entirely in JavaScript, this classic game is as much fun to recreate as it is to play. I had written a Ping Pong game in C++, this time I wanted to try a web-based approach for compatibility with browsers. Unlike the C++ implementation, this required intercommunication of the 3 layers, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: Easy Blog - A Blogging Platform
label: Blog
description: Powered by Django, Easy blog was supposed to serve as a simple and easy to use blog for my portfolio. Somehow it ended up being a full-featured blogging platform, allowing anyone to blog with a highly configured WYSYWIG Editor.

title: SDL2 - Pong
label: Game Dev
description: Using Simple DirectMedia Layer (SDL) library to create a a graphical classic Ping Pong game in C++

title: IMS - Inventory Management System
label: Enterprise / Management
description: Built for the military, an off-the-grid offline solution to manage military equipment worth millions of dollars. High level features include: inventory management, tracking, and reporting.

title: Ahmadz.ai
label: Portfolio (This Website)
description: My portfolio website, built with simplicity and focus on clean UI in mind. Data is read from local json files to mitigate points of failure, resulting in a highly failure-tolerant service.

title: Splite
label: Bot
description: Used by thousands of people daily, Splite is a highly intuitive bot aimed at providing fun and excitement while serving powerful moderation, role / emote management, and much more. This project helped me reinforce my knowledge of many core app-building features such as asynchronous API calls, optimization, and UX.

title: Assemly Station - OOP Project
description: The purpose of this term project was to put my C++ Object Oriented skills to test by developing a simulation of an assembly line with any number of stations.
label: School Work

title: Basic Auth Web App
description: A Simple Basic CRUD App using ExpressJS to serve handlebars views with data from MongoDB, and PostgreSQL databases.
label: School Work

title: Vacay
label: School Work
description: An introductory full-stack, simple bnb-like web application for course WEB322 in Seneca.
